languages.text: На это существо действует постоянный эффект, снижающий получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g} на 50%. Этот эффект может быть снят на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} путем нанесения {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} этому существу.
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −80%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing damage with psychic powers to that creature.

languages.text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо получает постоянный эффект, который снижает весь наносимый ему {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}физический урон{/g} на 50%. Этот эффект может быть снят на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} путем нанесения {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосил{/g} этому существу.

traits.locale_text: Grants the creature a permanent {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −80%, and {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}energy damage{/g} dealt to it by −40%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

languages.text: その生物が受けた全ての{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}を−50%軽減し、永続効果を授ける。この効果は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、その生物に{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与えるか{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えることで取り除ける。
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: その生物が受けた全ての{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}を−80%軽減し、{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を−40%軽減する、永続{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を授ける。この効果は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、その生物に{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与えるか{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えることで取り除ける。

その生物が受けた全ての{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}身体的ダメージ{/g}を−80%軽減し、{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}エネルギーダメージ{/g}を−40%軽減する、永続{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}を授ける。この効果は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、その生物に{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}を与えるか{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えることで取り除ける。

languages.text: 赋予此生物永久效果，使其遭受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}降低50%。当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此效果会失效，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后重新触发。
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 赋予此生物永久效果，使其遭受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}降低50%。当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此效果会失效，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后重新触发。

赋予此生物永久{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，使其承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}物理伤害{/g}降低80%，承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}能量伤害{/g}降低40%。当此生物受到{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}，或被{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此效果会失效，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}后重新触发。

languages.text: Concede a la criatura un efecto permanente que reduce todo el {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g} que recibe un −50 %. Este efecto se puede eliminar durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} al infligir {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} o infligir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} a la criatura.
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Concede a la criatura un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}efecto{/g} permanente que reduce todo el {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}daño físico{/g} que recibe un −80 % y el {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}daño elemental{/g} un −40 %. Este efecto se puede eliminar durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} al infligir {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g} o infligir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} a la criatura.

languages.text: Gewährt der Kreatur einen permanenten Effekt, der den gesamten erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physischen Schaden{/g} um −80 % und den erlittenen Energieschaden um −50 % reduziert. Dieser Effekt kann 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang entfernt werden, wenn der Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} zugefügt wird.
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gewährt der Kreatur einen permanenten {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}Effekt{/g}, der den gesamten erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physischen Sachden {/g} um -80 % und den erlittenen {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}Energieschaden{/g} um -40 % reduziert. Dieser Effekt kann 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang entfernt werden, wenn der Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} zugefügt wird.

languages.text: Confère à la créature un effet permanent qui réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g} qui lui sont infligés de −50 %. Cet effet peut être supprimé pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} en infligeant à cette créature des {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} issus de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Confère à la créature un {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effet{/g} permanent qui réduit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}dégâts physiques{/g} qui lui sont infligés de -80 % et tous les {g|Encyclopedia:EnergyDamage}dégâts d'énergie{/g} qu'elle subit de -40 %. Cet effet peut être supprimé pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} en infligeant à cette créature des {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g} ou des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} issus de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.

languages.text: Yaratığa, kendisine verilen tüm {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}fiziksel hasarı{/g} %50 azaltan kalıcı bir etki kazandırır. Bu etki, yaratığa {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasar{/g} vererek veya {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçleri{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} vererek 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} ortadan kaldırılabilir.
languages.original_text: Grants the creature a permanent effect reducing all {g|Encyclopedia:PhysicalDamage}physical damage{/g} dealt to it by −50%. This effect can be removed for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} by dealing {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g} or dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to that creature with {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.
